name: Dirk Vollmar
text:
I don't know it is related to your problem, but all your COM calls must come from within the same thread your add-in was created on. If you created new threads you must take special care. Details are described in these two articles:

- [Implementing IMessageFilter in an Office add-in][1] and 
- [Why your COMAddIn.Object should derive from StandardOleMarshalObject][2]


  [1]: http://blogs.msdn.com/andreww/archive/2008/11/19/implementing-imessagefilter-in-an-office-add-in.aspx
  [2]: http://blogs.msdn.com/andreww/archive/2008/08/11/why-your-comaddin-object-should-derive-from-standardolemarshalobject.aspx
